thread.title: Rachel Mullins
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Rachel Mullins

author: Rachel Mullins
title: Rachel Mullins
text: My Husband and I feel many years behind on our taxes. We were apprehensive to tackle the task of taxes in fear of what would unravel. We called Optima Tax Relief and were greeted with friendly knowledgeable help from the start. Our experience working with Optima was wonderful! we were lead by the hand every step of the way never feeling confused, stressed or fearful. I would highly recommend Optima Tax Relief to all my family and friends.
